title: New England's Abolitionist History at Odds With Racist Realities
itunes:title: New England's Abolitionist History at Odds With Racist Realities
description:
Here's the story that New England tells itself: Racism is a Southern problem. But our region's abolitionist past hides a darker history of racism, slavery and segregation. It's a legacy that lives with us today. This week on NEXT, we premiere a special series on racism in New England — produced by the New England News Collaborative and America Amplified.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
